name: Poorna Prajay S
bio: Passionate full-stack developer with expertise in building scalable web applications. Specialized in modern JavaScript frameworks and Python-based backend systems. Committed to writing clean, maintainable code and delivering exceptional user experiences.

workHistory.description: Built a full-featured e-commerce platform with real-time inventory management, payment integration, and admin dashboard.
Developed a comprehensive healthcare management system with patient records, appointment scheduling, and telemedicine features.
Created an analytics dashboard for social media metrics with real-time data visualization and reporting capabilities.

name: Vikram Kumar
bio: Mobile-first developer and designer with a keen eye for creating intuitive user experiences. Expert in cross-platform mobile development and modern design principles.

workHistory.description: Designed and developed a comprehensive fitness tracking application with workout plans, nutrition tracking, and social features.
Built a mobile app for food delivery with real-time tracking, payment integration, and restaurant management.

name: Ananya Sharma
bio: Data scientist specializing in machine learning and predictive analytics. Experienced in building ML models for real-world business problems and deriving actionable insights from complex datasets.

workHistory.description: Developed ML models to predict customer churn with 92% accuracy, enabling proactive retention strategies.
Built a real-time fraud detection system using deep learning to identify suspicious transactions.

name: Rahul Mehta
bio: Backend engineer and DevOps specialist focused on building robust, scalable infrastructure. Expert in cloud architecture, containerization, and CI/CD pipelines.

workHistory.description: Architected and deployed a microservices-based system handling 1M+ daily requests with 99.9% uptime.
Implemented automated CI/CD pipelines reducing deployment time by 70% and improving code quality.

name: Priya Reddy
bio: Frontend developer and UI/UX designer passionate about creating beautiful, accessible web experiences. Specialized in modern frontend frameworks and animation design.

workHistory.description: Created a comprehensive design system and component library used across 15+ products.
Developed a drag-and-drop portfolio builder with 50+ customizable templates and themes.
